jobDescription: Click here to login or register Back to the list  |  Forward this job to a friend  |  APPLY by email without registration  |  APPLY by creating / using your TSR Consulting account Reference # : 18-02813 Title : Data Analyst Location : Irving, TX Position Type : Contract Experience Level : Start Date / End Date : 06/27/2018 / 01/31/2019 DescriptionIf you are interested, email your updated resume to Kevin Grant - kgrant@tsrconsulting.comWe do not work with 3rd Party Vendors.  TSR Consulting is seeking a Data Analyst for a Financial Client in Irving, TXBachelor's Degree required in computer science, engineering, mathematics or analytically focused disciplineMinimum 3-4 years of professional work experience that includes advanced experience with data analysis and analytical programming along with experience in working directly with clients and/or business partners to identify needs and to deliver insights and recommendations.Proficiency in SAS and SQL REQUIRED.Experience with Teradata or similar relational database and UNIX/Linux scripting required.Advanced data reporting and visualization skills. Experience working with complex data systemsGood written and verbal communication skills. Ability to translate business needs into system/process designs. Comfortable presenting to peers and managementAbility to multi-task and work against tight deadlines. Extremely detail-oriented and possessing intellectual curiosityAbility to work independently with only baseline instructions/guidelines from management.
